# YamlHelper class

Provides helper methods for serializing and deserializing YAML content, with special handling for PowerShell objects.

```csharp
public static class YamlHelper
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [ToYaml](YamlHelper/ToYaml)(…) | Serializes any PowerShell object to YAML format, with specified serialization options. |
